errors.invalid_filename_streaminghistory:
It looks like you've selected one or more 'StreamingHistory.json' files. This means Spotify unfortunately has sent you the wrong files... 
You can find a guide on how to request the endsong.json files at https://support.spotistats.app/import/guide
errors.multiple_files: You can only upload 1 file at a time. You can immediatly upload another file after this one has been uploaded
errors.redeem_not_authenticated: To redeem the giftcard you need to be logged in
errors.not_authenticated: It looks like you're not logged in
errors.no_code_recieved: It looks like you don't entered a code

gift.personalize.description: You can personalize your gift by adding a message
gift.select_plan_first: You need to select a plan first
gift.order_info: Your gift codes will probably be there right away. If they aren't there, it could take a few hours. If you haven't received anything after 24 hours, send an email with your payment id to giftcodes{'@'}spotistats.app
gift.take_to_coupons_page: Take me to the coupons page

import.import.description: Select the endsong_*.json file you want to import
import.previous_imports.description: You can close this page while your files are being imported
import.delete_notice: Are you sure you want to remove this import and the {count} associated with it? This is irreversable and you'll have to import the file again if you want these streams back in your streaminghistory
import.no_imports_yet: It looks like you have no imports yet
import.authentication.description: Please enter your import code to continue

related.title: Related artists
